changes.description:
Added information to the `ModelDiff.Result` indicating how events have changed
between the diff'd models.
Added a media type parser and validation for the `@mediaType` trait.

Added additional default CORS headers and configuration for OpenAPI
conversions.

Added the `flattenNamespaces` build transform to flatten the namespaces of
shapes connected to a specified service in a model in to a target namespace.
Added support for the `@httpResponseCode` trait in the `HttpBindingIndex`.
Added protocol tests for the `@httpResponseCode` trait.
Fixed several issues that would cause Smithy to fail when running on Windows.

Fixed a bug where a `union` shape marked as an `@httpPayload` would throw an
exception when trying to resolve its content-type.

Fixed a bug in OpenAPI conversions where tags were not passed through unless
set in the `supportedTags` list, even when the `tags` setting was enabled.
